name: Limbs (Violet Fairy)
description:
This game was created for the Rotten Game Jam with the intention of being a bad game. (That said, some aspects did turn out pretty cool.)

The world is overrun with monsters, and the only thing that can save it is another monster! Customize your cryptid's strengths and fight in definitely very easy to understand, not at all confusing combat.

Creature art by Ranjan Raj Uprety (aka Hinduballer)!
